Port Said, Egypt 埃及塞得港

sentence.Network_en: He said they should turn their fire on the Conservative Party instead.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说他们应该掉转枪口，向保守党开火。

sentence.Network_en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
sentence.Network_cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

sentence.Network_en: He said parliament and the process of democracy had been debased.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说议会和民主程序已遭贬值。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 摩尔电码 - 搜搜百科 ... SASE - Self addressed,stamped envelope（ 自我解决，盖章信封） SED - Said（ 说（said）） SEZ - Says（ 说（said））.
Hoyle has said police wait out the gunman rather than storm the house ., 霍伊尔表示警方在枪手主动出来投降之前不会强行攻入屋内.
Will you intimate to me what he said ?, 你能给我暗示他所说的话吗?
" 戈登又说道(Said):"每一个体都可能投篮(Shooting)。我很骄贵由于我明白我的球队能够相信我，让我承当管理竞赛中的症结投篮。

list.abs: 八三夭的歌词..._百度知道 ... I said 我说 you said 你说 I wish that I could be stronger…. 我希望我可以更坚强.

她的话让我痛不欲生I said 我说：“Who put all those things in your head? “谁往你的头脑灌输这.
your said you cherished freedom so ., 你说你珍惜自由.

encyclopedia.content: 一。 什么是SAID SAID(Solaris Automatic Installation DVD)，即Solaris自动安装DVD，是为方便Solaris的安装和使用而制作的一张可引导的DVD安装光盘。SAID的实现主要基于Solaris提供的Flash Archive和JumpStart技术，详情请见SAID实现原理。 二。 为什么使用SAID 1. 安装过程自动化，安装速度快 使用SAID，可以实现Solaris安装的完全自动化，安装过程无需人工干预；而且SAID能大大提高Solaris安装的速度，与通常的安装方式相比，

entry.def: Said is the past tense and past participle of say.

means.word_mean: 1. being the one previously mentioned or spoken of;

auth_sentence.content: Doomed to fail, that's what everyone said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Doomed to fail, that's what everyone said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doomed to fail, that's what everyone said.

auth_sentence.content: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.

auth_sentence.content: He also said Saddam Hussein had no active WMD.

sentences.cn: “别忘了，他是个政客。”“不用多说了。”

sentences.en: He’s very angry and she’s very upset, so don’t say anything about cars or accidents. Remember, the less said, the better.
sentences.cn: 他很生气，而她又很难过，所以你别提车或者车祸的事。记住，少说为妙。

means.word_mean: (做)某事有/没有很多优点(或好处)：某事物有/没有多少可说的

sentences.en: There’s a lot to be said for eating sensibly.
sentences.cn: 饮食合理的好处不胜枚举。

sentences.en: There’s not much to be said for this book; in fact, it’s the worst book I’ve ever read.
sentences.cn: 这本书没什么可标榜的。说实在的，这是我读过的最糟糕的一本书。

sentences.en: She doesn’t have a lot of experience but, when all is said and done, she’s the best person for the job.
sentences.cn: 她没有多少经验，不过，她毕竟是做这项工作最合适的人选。

sentences.en: ‘That was the most boring lecture I’ve ever heard.’ ‘You said it!’
sentences.cn: “这是我听过的最乏味的演讲。”“一点不假。”
